graph.packing

Class IntSetN21GraphAllMovesMaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • popt4jlib.LocalSearch.IntSetN21AllMovesMaker
      • graph.packing.IntSetN21GraphAllMovesMaker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, AllChromosomeMakerIntf

    public class IntSetN21GraphAllMovesMaker
extends IntSetN21AllMovesMaker
    class is an implementation of the AllChromosomeMakerIntf interface, and implements local search in the N_{2+1} neighborhood of ints: read the documentation of its super-classes for a detailed explanation. Works with the 1- and 2-packing problems.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011-2015

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou
    See Also:

      • isOK2Add

        protected boolean isOK2Add(java.lang.Integer tid,
                           IntSet x,
                           java.util.HashMap params)
        hook method in the context of the Template Method Design Pattern. Overrides this method to modify the behavior of the base move-maker.
        Overrides:
        isOK2Add in class IntSetN21AllMovesMaker
        Parameters:
        tid - Integer
        x - IntSet
        params - HashMap must contain the pair <"dls.graph", Graph g>, and may optionally contain the pair <"dls.lock_graph", boolean_val> which if present and false, will avoid locking graph elements.
        Returns:
        boolean

        private boolean isFree2Cover(Node nj,
